text: James "Jimmy" Perry OBE (9 September 1923 - 23 October 2016) was an English writer, scriptwriter, producer, author and actor who is known for creating the BBC sitcom Dad's Army. Perry was born on September 9, 1923 in Barnes, Surrey, England.John Oliver "Croft, David (1922-2011) and Perry, Jimmy (1923-)", BFI screenonline He studied at Colet Court and at St Paul's School. Perry lived in Algarve, Portugal.
